summary: HAVE 04 GTO AND HEARD ABOUT THE FRONT TIRES (INSIDE) RUBBING ON THE STRUTS (5/5/07)...READ INTERNET ARTICLES ABOUT TIRE FAILURES AND THE ONE ACCIDENT IN CLEVELAND. I CHECKED THE CONDITION (5/5/07) ON MY CAR BY REMOVING BOTH FRONT WHEELS AND DISCOVERED SERIOUS TIRE DAMAGE AND RUB MARKS ON THE STRUTS..I HAVE "GROUNDED" THE CAR DUE THE THIS CONDITION, PENDING INFORMATION ON HOW TO CORRECT THE CONDITION AND RELATED COSTS. NEITHER GM NOR MY DEALERSHIP CONTACTED ME TO FLAG THIS SERIOUS SAFETY CONDITION.*JB
